lexUnit.name: evaporate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: turn from liquid into vapour

sentence.text: The specimen should be cold and in a cool room , otherwise the acetone will evaporate too quickly from its surface .
The specimen should be left for at least half an hour for the acetone to evaporate .
Slice fungi and fry down with the butter and onions until all the liquid has evaporated .
Bring to the boil and cook until all of the liquid has evaporated -- the beans should be glossy and bright green .
Uncover , stir gently and then continue to cook for another 15 minutes , or until most of the liquid has evaporated , and you are left with a browned , thickened sauce .
Boil rapidly for about 5-10 minutes until the beans are tender and the liquid almost evaporated .
The liquid thus continues to evaporate .
Most building materials are porous to some extent , although in a well-designed and properly maintained building the absorbed moisture can evaporate harmlessly to the outside .
Cook gently , uncovered , stirring from time to time , for about half an hour , until most of the moisture has evaporated and the tomatoes are in a pulp .
The elasticity of each silk line and the large numbers of them , coupled with the surface tension of water , keeps the drop of water in place until it evaporates .
When the water evaporates it goes on a cloud and then the cloud goes in any place and later it goes out as rain .
If the water on the leaves evaporates in strong daylight , it can burn the leaves causing brown areas which rot leaving holes and ` tatty leaves " .
Turn down the heat to a simmer and continue to cook for another 8-10 minutes or until most of the water has evaporated .
There the waters are evaporating and supplies of fresh fish are dwindling .
There the nectar does not evaporate as quickly as it would if it were in a more exposed position .
Some particles , however , do not evaporate completely and survive the entry-heat to impact on the Earth 's surface .
If liquid water appeared on the surface of a world that was in a vacuum , it would evaporate instantly .
Essential oils evaporate readily and are easily damaged by light , extremes of temperature and prolonged exposure to oxygen in the air .
When conditions are hot , horses can lose a lot of sweat without you even knowing because it evaporates so quickly .
In the long run , every black hole in the universe will evaporate in this way .
